info.author: Gillian Gold gillian.gold@yale.edu
info.abstract:
The KC Export component creates an export of an existing model or template for creating a new KC model.
This function takes the student-step roll-up exported from DataShop and exports the KC model. One or more existing KC models can be selected to use as a template for the new one or it will just be a blank template if nothing is selected
After running the component:
Edit the KC model file output in Excel or other text-file/spreadsheet editor.
Define the KC model by filling in the cells in the column KC (new KC model name), replacing “new KC model name” with a name for your model.
Assign multiple KCs to a step by adding additional KC (model name) columns, placing one KC in each column. Replace "model name" with the same model name you used for your new model; you will have multiple columns with the same header.
Add additional KC models by creating a new KC (model name) column for each KC model, replacing "model name" with the name of your new model.
Import the new KC models with the KC Import component.
info.outputs: Tab-delimited file containing KC model export
info.options: KC Models -- Select the columns containing the KC models in the student step that will be used as a template. Multiple selection is allowed. Select nothing for a blank template.
